text: Johnny Lockwood (7 December 1920 - 25 April 2013) was an English- AustralianAtterton, Margot. (Ed.) The Illustrated Encyclopaedia of Australian Showbiz, Sunshine Books, 1984. p 137 actor and comedian who is best known for his role as Aldo Godolfus in Number 96. Lockwood was born on 7 December 1920 in London, England. He was married to Anne Lockwood from 1947 until her death in 1973. He remarried in 1980. He had one daughter. Lockwood died on 25 April 2013 in his home in Coffs Harbour, New South Wales, Australia from natural causes, aged 92.Daily Telegraph Number 96 star Johnny Lockwood dead at 92 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1920 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:Australian comedians Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian voice actors Category:Comedians from London Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors
title: Johnny Lockwood
